__LOGO_OR_SITENAME__

Dear *|FNAME|*,

This is where you’d make a personal appeal to your readers. These types of emails are typically a few hundred words long, with a few grafs explaining the nature of the appeal and why readers should support your organization.

You can send these emails as one-off emails to readers during a fundraising campaign, or you can build them into your onboarding flow to try to convert new readers into paying supporters.

These emails can include grafs, or sometimes bullet points with key items listed out.

At the end, make sure you have a clear to call to action. Think carefully about the actual message. You could try something simple, like “Support us” or “Donate now,” or something more specific, like, “Yes, I want to support local journalism!” Try several different CTAs and see what works best.
